title: PVP.net Patcher Ketnel has stopped working
body:
This is happening to me. Made no system changes, was just away for two weeks.

Things I have already tried:

* I already tried running in administrator mode, and running the admin launcher.
* I tried forcing repatch
* I uninstalled and reinstalled and it is still happening
* Ran netsh winsock reset and restarted
* Brought Windows Update up to date
* Turned off Windows Firewall
* Tried running in admin mode again

Nothing from the regular list of fixes seems to be working, and this is happening on a fresh install. What should I do?
